title: Teleporter - Novel Updates
author: SoLa
description: Nakajo Seiya, he is a magician who was born in an unrelated household. However, when he falls ill under an unknown disease, he finds that he has an enormous magic power in his body, and his parents abandon him. A woman who appeared there said: “Be my disciple.” This is the turning point of his life. Nakajo Seiya chose to live as a magician with his master, the woman who saved him. He chose the way to live as a magician while holding a handicap that he can not cast spells……?>
